course_title: Latinx Representation in Media, Films, and Pop Culture 001
course_title_2023: Latinx Representation in Media, Films, and Pop Culture
best_gem_comment: Definitely take this course! It teaches you very interesting things about Latinx media and what representation actually is. The assignments are few, and the class usually consists of videos, music, guest speakers, and conversation. Prof. Americo is also very kind and enthusiastic about the course. It's truly a gem.
